2052.subject: SBS
2052.descrlong: Provides hands-on training in archaeology methods and procedures. Includes readings and applied learning in which students undertake a specific analytical or experimental procedure that makes use of archaeological materials recovered in the field. Content may vary depending on student interests and project schedules. Covers basic procedures for archaeological fieldwork, and the use of archaeological technologies. Includes artifact collections and specimens analysis; mapping and interpretation; faunal analysis and bone identification; ceramic and lithic analysis; and collections management.
